Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, email, nom, prenom, role FROM users ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, email, nom, prenom FROM users ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, login, nom, prenom, email, actif, LENGTH(password_hash) as pwd_length FROM users ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT proname, proowner::regrole FROM pg_proc WHERE proname = ''verify_password'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, login, nom, prenom, actif, boucherie_id, is_super_admin FROM users WHERE login = ''nacer'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT n.nspname as schema, p.proname as function FROM pg_proc p JOIN pg_namespace n ON p.pronamespace = n.oid WHERE p.proname = ''crypt'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT prosrc FROM pg_proc WHERE proname = ''verify_password'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT extensions.crypt(''admin'', password_hash) as test_crypt, password_hash FROM users WHERE login = ''admin'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT login, password_hash, extensions.crypt(''admin'', password_hash) as computed_hash, (password_hash = extensions.crypt(''admin'', password_hash)) as match FROM users WHERE login = ''admin'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT schemaname, tablename, rowsecurity FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = ''public'' ORDER BY tablename;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, permissive, roles, cmd, qual FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename = ''users'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_users FROM users; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_encaissements FROM encaissements; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_factures FROM factures;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT has_schema_privilege(''anon'', ''public'', ''USAGE'') as anon_schema_ok, has_function_privilege(''anon'', ''public.verify_password(text, text)'', ''EXECUTE'') as anon_fonction_ok, verify_password(''nacer'', ''nacer123'') as connexion_nacer_ok;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_total_tracabilite FROM tracabilite;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ylhwyotluskuhkjumqpf.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT table_name, COUNT(*) as nb FROM tracabilite GROUP BY table_name ORDER BY nb DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_users FROM users; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_encaissements FROM encaissements; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_factures FROM factures; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_fournisseurs FROM fournisseurs; SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_boucheries FROM boucheries;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, login, nom, prenom, actif, is_super_admin FROM users ORDER BY created_at;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT verify_password(''admin'', ''admin'') as connexion_admin, verify_password(''nacer'', ''nacer123'') as connexion_nacer, verify_password(''hany'', ''hany123'') as connexion_hany;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT verify_password(''admin'', ''admin123'') as test_admin123, verify_password(''admin'', ''Admin123'') as test_Admin123;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, fournisseur, date_facture, piece_jointe FROM factures WHERE piece_jointe IS NULL OR piece_jointe = '''' ORDER BY date_facture DESC LIMIT 25;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT piece_jointe FROM factures WHERE piece_jointe IS NOT NULL AND piece_jointe != '''' LIMIT 1;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT piece_jointe FROM factures WHERE piece_jointe IS NOT NULL AND piece_jointe <> '''' LIMIT 1;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS produits CASCADE;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT schemaname, sequencename FROM pg_sequences WHERE schemaname = ''public'' AND (sequencename LIKE ''%invendus%'' OR sequencename LIKE ''%categories%'');")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE boucheries SET mobile = true WHERE nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel''; SELECT id, nom, secteur, mobile FROM boucheries WHERE nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_total_invendus FROM invendus; SELECT TO_CHAR(date, ''YYYY-MM'') as mois, COUNT(*) as nb_invendus, SUM(valeur_estimee) as total_valeur FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, ''YYYY-MM'') ORDER BY mois;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT column_name, data_type, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''boucheries'' AND column_name IN (''mobile'', ''mobile_autorise'') ORDER BY column_name;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "UPDATE boucheries SET mobile_autorise = true WHERE nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel''; SELECT id, nom, secteur, mobile, mobile_autorise FROM boucheries WHERE nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT id, nom, prix_moyen, actif FROM categories_invendus ORDER BY nom;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT TO_CHAR(date, ''YYYY-MM'') as mois, COUNT(*) as nb_invendus FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, ''YYYY-MM'') ORDER BY mois DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_dec_2025 FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND date >= ''2025-12-01'' AND date <= ''2025-12-31'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT i.date, i.categorie_id, i.produit, i.quantite, i.valeur_estimee, c.nom as categorie FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id LEFT JOIN categories_invendus c ON i.categorie_id = c.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND i.date = ''2025-12-06'' ORDER BY i.created_at;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT i.date, c.nom as categorie, COUNT(*) as nb_doublons, array_agg(i.id) as ids, array_agg(i.quantite) as quantites, array_agg(i.valeur_estimee) as valeurs FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id LEFT JOIN categories_invendus c ON i.categorie_id = c.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' GROUP BY i.date, i.categorie_id, c.nom HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY i.date DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT c.nom as categorie, COUNT(*) as nb_invendus, SUM(i.valeur_estimee) as total_valeur FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id LEFT JOIN categories_invendus c ON i.categorie_id = c.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND i.date >= ''2025-12-01'' AND i.date <= ''2025-12-31'' GROUP BY c.nom ORDER BY total_valeur DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT TO_CHAR(date, ''DD/MM/YYYY'') as date, produit, valeur_estimee FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND date >= ''2025-12-01'' AND date <= ''2025-12-31'' ORDER BY date;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT SUM(valeur_estimee) as total_decembre FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND date >= ''2025-12-01'' AND date <= ''2025-12-31'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" "postgresql://postgres:p4zN25F7Gfw9Py@db.ghqeiknovctwqpucoeuv.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -c "SELECT SUM(valeur_estimee) as total_novembre FROM invendus i JOIN boucheries b ON i.boucherie_id = b.id WHERE b.nom = ''Le Fournil de Moissy-Cramayel'' AND date >= ''2025-11-01'' AND date <= ''2025-11-30'';")
